Web Presences

Book Free Consultation

Kaffeinated Kodemonkey is focused on helping rural commites and local goverment excell online.

Our team makes it easy to have a web presence. Contact our team and we will help customize a package that is right for your business.

Our packages are built to deliver everyting a business needs to be successful with no extra fluff added.

What's Included:

  • Content layout
  • Google Analytics
  • ADA Certification
  • Platform installations and setup
  • Domain and Hosting - First year free
  • Tech Support - We stay on top of security and platform updates for you

All packages reflect a base cost and can be ajusted to your business needs.

Just looking for Hosting we got that too for $15 per mon.

Microsite

Cost: $199 Setup/$15 mo

What is a Microsite?

Our Microsite offers you a simple design that is responsive, ADA compliant, and search engine friendly. It includes a one (1) page design outlining:

  • Who you are
  • What your service or product is
  • NAP info - Name, Address, Phone
  • Hours of Operation
  • Contact us form
  • Google maps for brick and morter locations

Recommended Use:

This type of site is Recommended for business that are on a low budget, just starting out, or do not have the need at the time for a large site.

Government

Cost: Based on package

The kodemonkey team has been building government websites at an affordable cost for the past 4 years.

We understand the ins-and-outs of various platforms and are able to work around any seemingly impossible issues.

Kaffeinated Kodemonkey is a SME in Web Accessibilty and understing Seciction 508 this is why all our site included a basic ADA Certificate.

We offer two (2) services for our packages:

  • Redesig - Our team will add a base template/theme to the site for a fresh new look,
  • Rebrading - We will leverage the Studio SiX team to work with you in rebrading and creating a custom design for your site.
Migraton Only

  • Basic Tech Support
